official_title: To amend section 6(d) of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to increase the amount of payments made by public housing agencies in lieu of paying State, city, county, and local taxes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Community and Education Investment Act of 1993

summary.text: Community and Education Investment Act of 1993 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise the method of calculating the amounts paid by public housing agencies in lieu of State and local real and personal property taxes.

titles.title: Community and Education Investment Act of 1993

To amend section 6(d) of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to increase the amount of payments made by public housing agencies in lieu of paying State, city, county, and local taxes, and for other purposes.
